description: Chris is a 21 year old college student majoring in biology and works part-time as a waiter in an Italian restaurant in downtown Atlanta.He studies hard and works hard, but somehow Chris finds the time to party even harder. He doesn't have a steady girlfriend, but he has a couple 'casual' girlfriends which also occupy his time. We don't know how he does it all, but he's doing it somehow, and of course, he still works out at the gym, which he assures us is a top priority. Chris impressed us on many levels, and we think he'll impress you too.Check him out in the downloadable video in three scenes. First he starts out in the living room where he gets a little bit more comfortable. He moves on to the bathroom where he strips down and then enjoys a nice shower. Finally, watch him in bed working himself up to a great climax where he releases all the pressure that's been building inside for the past week.
title: Chris
